alert.note: Alert for Citrus; Hernando (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 3:59PM EDT until August 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Citrus County in west central Florida... Northwestern Hernando County in west central Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Island, or 11 miles south of Homosassa Springs, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chassahowitzka Refuge, Chassahowitzka and Homosassa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
